lead_paragraph: The minimum score for the most competitive of the programs, which have 300 slots, was achieved by 1,788 students.
snippet: The minimum score for the most competitive of the programs, which have 300 slots, was achieved by 1,788 students.

headline.main: More Pre-K Pupils Qualify for Gifted Programs
headline.seo: More Pre-K Pupils Qualify for Gifted Programs
headline.print_headline: Many More Pupils Qualify for Gifted Programs in City Kindergartens This Fall

byline.contributor:
Robert Gebeloff and Bao Ong contributed reporting.
This article was updated to reflect that 3,542 students in New York City who took exams this winter to qualify for gifted kindergarten programs scored at or above the national 90th percentile.
